mil5.1.4:1.2: aṭṭhime, bhikkhave → aṭṭha kho ime ānanda (7D.171/1); aṭṭhime ānanda (17A8.70/1)
mil5.1.4:11.2: dhammasīsakassa → dhammāsīsakassa (mr) | dānanissandabalava → dānanissandabala (bj, pts-vp-pli1); dānabala (maku) | chinnapattapādapā → sīnapattapādapā (bj); nisinnapattā (maku); sīnapattāpādapā (pts-vp-pli1) | bubbuḷā → bubbulā (bj, maku); pubbuḷā (mr)
mil5.1.4:13.2: bhinno parāpavādakumbho → bhinnā parappavādakumbhā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); gumbo tayā viddhaṁsito (maku) | nibbāhanaṁ → nibbāyanaṁ (mr)
